question: Choose the drug whose single oral dose affords clinical cure of uncomplicated malaria caused by chloroquine sensitive /resistant P. Falciparum as well as P. Vivax

paths: (Chloroguanide)-TREATS->(HIV)-LOCATION_OF->(Lipopolysaccharides)-PART_OF->(Cartilage and Endothelium, Vascular and Transplanted tissue)-LOCATION_OF->(Combined Modality Therapy)
